Package com.coolhandsoftware.trailtrace

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INoNetworkDialogListener
    Callback interface for the no network dialog.
    IRouteDrawReceiver
    This is the interface the RouteDrawView calls through when it has finished rendering a drawn route from a touch event and needs to notify its parent Activity with its coordinates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressListAdapter
    This class overrides ArrayAdapter
    to provide a better presentation/layout of Address information for each View in the ListView by overriding the getView method.
    AddressListAdapter.ViewHolder  
    DrawnPathManager
    This class manages the traces drawn in the RouteDrawFragment and switching in between pixels and GeoPoints.
    HelpActivity
    This is the activity launched from the "?" button.
    MapActivity
    This is the launcher activity for the application.
    MapFragment
    This fragment holds the map itself for the MapActivity.
    NoNetworkDialogFragment  
    RouteDrawFragment
    This fragment allows the user to trace a raw route on the screen.
    RouteDrawView
    This View is how the MapActivity captures touch events when the user is drawing on the map.
    SearchActivity
    This class handles searching for locations via Nominatim.
